name: Sagittarius-111
description: With sofas, it doesn’t take a lot of designing to mesmerize its customers for best furniture in Bangladesh. Moreover, a good design is as less design as possible. Sagittarius stands out through its minimalistic design which complements the decorum of each and every living room space. Kiln-dried imported beech veneered engineered wood provides this sofa a sturdy and firm structure. Upholstered fabric allows this sofa to have a soft and comfortable cushioning.

name: Wallace-283
description: Made from Kiln-dried imported Beech veneered engineered wood. High quality environment friendly Italian Ultra Violet (UV) and Polyurethane (PU) Lacquer in antique finish Please refer to images for dimension details

name: Moseley-281
description: Comfort isn’t something Moseley has dealt lightly with. Whether it’s a cozy night or a lazy afternoon this sofa is a perfect fit for your relaxation. The fabrics in this sofa was made using environment friendly Polyurethane and imported upholstery which provide this sofa with immense soft cushioning. High resilient extra cotton padded foam provides durability and great seating comfort. A high back grants your neck to have extra support. Moseley is especially structured to ensure your relaxation and seating comfier.

name: Organ-304
description: The Organ-304 is an exquisite comfort piece made for a cozy and relaxed household. This seater is comfortable and designed to blend into any workspace or comfort home. The sofa is sleek and perfect for households with minimalist decor. It is sturdy and comfortable and has two armrests made of wood and covered with soft cushioning. The backrest is made with imported fabric upholstery and provided with soft durable cushioning. It is an exquisite piece of furniture made for the utmost comfort inside the household.

name: Simsbury-285
description: The living room is a place where the whole family gathers to have a conversation, mostly for entertainment purposes. For joint families, organizing space is considered to be a mammoth task. Well, space is not an issue with Simsburry-285. Whether your family is a conjugal one or an avuncular one this sofa is sheer perfect for your living room. Family time, cozy afternoon naps, movie nights or even with hosting guest’s space shouldn’t be something to worry about with the Simsburry. For families residing with children and grandparents this seems to be a practical and logical choice.

name: Angelina-179
description: Angelina is not just a sofa, it’s a contemporary furniture statement. This U-shaped upholstery sofa by Hatil caters to the style choice of urban, up-to-the-minute furniture enthusiasts. The engineered wooden base complements the cushioning and together the sofa gets a graceful outlook.
